name: xThemeSong
overview: Download theme songs from YouTube or upload custom MP3s for your media library
description: A plugin that automatically downloads theme songs from YouTube by user provided video ID/URL or allows uploading custom MP3 files. Features complete Web UI with three-dot menu integration, drag-and-drop upload, and audio player.
changelog: CRITICAL FIX: Resolved YoutubeExplode dependency version conflict by downgrading to the exact version (6.3.16.0) expected by Jellyfin. Fixed .csproj file syntax error with missing closing tag. ENHANCEMENT: Ensured YoutubeExplode library is correctly included in the plugin output. MAINTENANCE: Updated version numbers across all files for consistency.
